Title: The Big Year
Overview: Three fanatical bird-watchers spend an entire year competing to spot the highest number of species as El Nino sends an extraordinary variety of rare breeds flying up into the U.S., but they quickly discover that there are more important things than coming out on top of the competition.
production_companies: Ingenious Media, Dune Entertainment, Fox 2000 Pictures, Deuce Three Productions, Sunswept Entertainment, Red Hour Films
Cast: Owen Wilson, Steve Martin, Jack Black
clean_text: big year three fanatical birdwatcher spend entire year compete spot high number specie el nino send extraordinary variety rare breed fly quickly discover important thing come competition search comedy david frankel owen wilson steve martin jack black 2011
